title: How is my sleeping quality evaluated by Talkband B1?
answer:
Your sleeping quality is evaluated by your time of deepsleep, which is calculated by the Huawei TalkBand app:

  • Deepsleep time < 1 hour: poor sleeping quality
  • 1hour ≤ Deep sleep time ≤ 3 hours: average sleeping quality
  • Deep sleep time > 3hours: good sleeping quality
